short_text: The Surah derives its name from the initial letter Qaf, thereby implying that it is the Surah which opens with the alphabetic letter Qaf.
text:
The Surah derives its name from the initial letter Qaf, thereby implying that it is the Surah which opens with the alphabetic letter Qaf.

Period of Revelation

There is no authentic tradition to show as to when exactly this Surah was sent down. A study of the subject matter, however, reveals that its period of revelation is the second stage of the Holy Prophet's life at Makkah, which lasted from the third year of the Prophethood till the fifth year. We have given the characteristics of this period in the Introduction to the Surah Al-An'am. In view of those characteristics it can be said that this Surah might have been sent down in about the 5th year, when the antagonism of the disbelievers had become quite intense but had not yet assumed tyrannical proportions.

Theme and Topics

Authentic traditions show that the Holy Prophet used to recite this Surah generally in the Prayer on the Eid days. A woman named Umm Hisham bin Harithah, who was a neighbor of the Holy Prophet, says that she was able to commit Surah Qaf to memory only because she often heard it from the Holy Prophet in the Friday sermons. According to some other traditions he often recited it in the Fajr Prayer. This makes it abundantly clear that this was an important Surah in the sight of the Holy Prophet. That is why he made sure that its contents reached as many people as possible over and over again.

This reason for this importance can be easily understood by a careful study of the Surah. The theme of the entire Surah is the Hereafter. When the Holy Prophet started preaching his message in Makkah what surprised the people most was the news that people would be resurrected after death, and they would have to render an account of their deeds. They said that that was impossible; human mind could not believe that that would happen. After all, how could it be possible that when the body had disintegrated into dust the scattered particles would be reassembled after hundreds of thousands of years to make up the same body once again and raised up as a living body, Allah in response sent down this discourse. In it, on the one hand, arguments have been given for the possibility and occurrence of the Hereafter in a brief way, in short sentences, and, on the other, the people have been warned, as if to say: "Whether you express wonder and surprise, or you regard it as something remote
from reason, or deny it altogether, in any case it cannot change the truth. The absolute, un-alterable truth is that Allah knows the whereabouts of each and every particle of your body that has scattered away in the earth, and knows where and in what state it is. Allah's one signal is enough to make all the scattered particles gather together again and to make you rise up once again as you had been made in the first instance. Likewise, your this idea that you have been created and left free to yourselves in the world and that you have not been made answerable to anyone, is no more than a misunderstanding. The fact is that not only is Allah Himself directly aware of each act and word of yours, even of the ideas that pass in your mind, but His angels also are attached to each one of you, who are preserving the record of whatever you do and utter. When the time comes, you will come out of your graves at one call just as young shoots of vegetable sprout up from the earth on the first
shower of the rain. Then this heedlessness which obstructs your vision will be removed and you will see with your own eyes all that you are denying today. At that time you will realize that you had not been created to be irresponsible in this world but accountable to all your deeds the meeting out of the rewards and punishments, the Hell and Heaven, which you regard as impossible and imaginary things, will at that time become visible realities for you in consequence of your enmity and opposition to the Truth you will be cast into the same Hell which you regard as remote from reason today and the ones who fear the Merciful God and return to the path of righteousness, will be admitted to the same Paradise at whose mention you now express wonder and surprise.
description: The surah that opens with the single discrete Arabic letter Qāf. It deals predominantly with the Resurrection and the Day of Judgement. Reference is made to previous generations of disbelievers (verse 12 .), both to warn the disbelievers in Mecca and to reassure the Prophet. Creation is cited as an indication of God’s ability to bring the dead to life again (verse 3 .), and emphasis is placed on the powerlessness of man on the Day of Resurrection (verse 20). The surah both opens and closes with mention of the Quran.

Efendi Nahi.verse 50:2: Po, ata janë çuditur që nga mesi i tyre u ka ardhur një paralajmërues, e mohuesit thonë: “Kjo gjë është e çuditshme”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:3: Vallë, a pasi të vdesin e të bëhemi dhé (do të ringjallemi)? Ai kthim është i largët!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:4: Na dimë çka do t’ua mungojë toka atyre (pasi të vdesin), te Ne është Libri që i ruan të gjitha.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:5: Aq më tepër, ta e mohuan të Vërtetën kur u erdhi dhe ata janë në gjendje të luhatshme (në çështjen e profetnisë).
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:6: A, nuk e kanë shikuar ata qiellin që qëndron mbi ta, si e kemi ndërtuar dhe zbukuruar, e i cili nuk ka kurrfarë të mete (çrregullimi)!
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:7: E, Tokën e kemi shtruar dhe në të kemi shpërndarë male të palëvizshme dhe kemi bërë që nga ajo të mbijnë gjithfarë lloj bimësh të bukur,
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:8: për t’u menduar dhe këshilluar çdo rob që i drjtohet Zotit të vet.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:9: Ne nga qielli lëshojmë ujin (shiun) e bekuar dhe bëjmë që me të, të ujiten kopshtijet dhe drithërat që korren.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:10: Dhe palmet e hurmës së lartë me kalavesh njëri mbi tjetrin,
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:11: ushqim për robërit (njerëzit), dhe Ne me shi e ringjallim tokën (visin) e vdekur; e kështu do të jetë edhe dalja (prej tokës – ringjallja).
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:12: Pas tyre, kanë mohuar populli i Nuhut, edhe banorët e Ressit dhe Themudi,
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:13: dhe Adi dhe Faraoni, dhe vëllezërit (populli) e Lutit,
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:14: edhe banorët e Ejkës dhe populli i Tubbas; të gjithë ata i kanë përgënjeshtruar pejgamberët dhe ndaj tyre u sendërtua dënimi Im.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:15: E, vallë, mos jemi lodhur Ne gjatë krijimit të parë? Jo, por ata dyshojnë në krijimin e sërishëm.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:16: Na e kemi krijuar njeriun dhe Na dimë çka i pëshpërit shpirti atij, se Ne (me dijeninë Tonë) jemi më afër se damari i tij i qafës,
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:17: (dhe nga të dy engjëjt) të cilët i rrinë atij nga ana e djathtë dhe e majtë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:18: dhe ai nuk e thotë asnjë fjalë e që pranë tij të mos jetë ai që mbikëqyrë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:19: Mundimet e vdekjes do të arrijnë me siguri – kësaj nuk mund t’i ikësh
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:20: dhe do të fryhet në Sur – kjo është Dita e premtimit –
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:21: dhe çdonjëri do të vijë, e me të ka grahës dhe dëshmitar.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:22: Ti, me të vërtetë, ke qenë i pakujdesshëm për këtë (momentin e vdekjes), andaj ta kemi ngritur perden (e syve), dhe shikimi yt sot është i prehtë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:23: E, shoku i tij do të thotë: “Ky pranë meje, është i gatshëm”
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:24: (u thuhet): “Hidheni në zjarr çdo mohues inatçi,
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:25: pengues i të mirave, që kalon (kufirin) dhe i cili dyshon (në fé),
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:26: i cili, pos Perëndisë, beson në zot tjetër – andaj hidhe atë në dënimin më të rëndë!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:27: E, shoku i tij do të thotë: “O Zoti ynë, unë nuk e kam mashtruar atë, por ai vet ka qenë në humbje të madhe”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:28: Atyre (Perëndia) do t’ju thotë: “Mos u grindni para Meje, Unë ju kam lajmëruar premtimin (dënimin),
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:29: Fjala Ime nuk ndryshohet dhe Unë nuk jam zullumqar i robërve të Mi”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:30: Në Ditën kur do ta pyesin xhehennemin: “A u mbushe?” e ai, përgjigjet: “A ka edhe më?”
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:31: E, xhenneti do t’u afrohet besimtarëve, jo larg.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:32: Kjo ju është premtuar, çdokujt që është penduar dhe ruajtur (nga kalimi i kufirit),
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:33: i cili frikohet prej Perëndisë edhe atëhrë kur nuk e sheh kush dhe i cili vie me zemër të kthyer kah Perëndia”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:34: (U thuhet atyre): “Hyni në të (në xhennet), në qetësi (e mirësi), kjo është Dita e përhershme!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:35: Në të do të kenë çka të duan – e prej Nesh edhe më shumë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:36: E, sa gjenerata i kemi shkatërruar par tyre, duke qenë ata më të fortë (se Kurejshit) dhe ata bredhnin nëpër Tokë. – E, a kanë mund të gjejnë strehim?!
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:37: Me të vërtetë, për të gjitha këto ka këshillë për atë që ka mend ose që dëgjon, e që është i përqëndruar.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:38: Ne, kemi krijuar qiejt dhe Tokën dhe çdo gjë që gjendet mes tyre për gjashtë ditë (periudha kohore), dhe nuk na përshkoi kurrëfarë lodhje.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:39: Andaj, duroje atë që e thonë ata dhe madhëroje Zotin tënd, dhe falenderoje Atë para lindjes së diellit dhe para muzgut,
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:40: dhe madhëroje Atë në një pjesë të natës dhe pas kryerjes së namazit.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:41: Dhe përgjoje ti! Ditën kur thërritësi (engjëlli) thërret prej vendit të afërt,
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:42: Ditën kur ata do ta dëgjojnë zërin e vërtetë, ajo do të jetë Dita e daljes (ringjalljes).
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:43: Na, me të vërtetë, japim gjallëri dhe japim vdekje dhe te Ne është kthimi!
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:44: E, në Ditën kur toka do të çahet e të dalin ata me nxitim; kjo është ringjallja, për Ne (kjo) është lehtë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 50:45: Na dimë mirë çka thonë ata; e ti nuk je ai që i shtrëngon ata (të besojnë), por këshilloje me Kur’an atë që i druan premtimit (dënimit) Tim!

null.verse 50:1: Qaf! (Ya Peyğəmbər!) Şanlı Qur'ana and olsun (ki, Məkkə müşrikləri sənə iman gətirmədilər)!
null.verse 50:2: Bəli! ?zlərindən (Onları Allahın əzabı ilə) qorxudan bir peyğəmbər gəldiyinə təəccüb etdilər. Kafirlər dedilər:" Bu əcaba bir şeydir! (İnsandan da peyğəmbər olarmı?! Ancaq mələk peyğəmbər ola bilər!)
null.verse 50:3: Məgər biz ölüb torpaq olduqdan sonra (yenidən diriləcəyik)? Bu, (həqiqətən) uzaq (qeyri-mümkün) bir qayıdışdır!"
null.verse 50:4: Həqiqətən, Biz yerin onlardan nəyi əskiltdiyini (onların tədriclə necə çürüdüb məhv etdiyini) bilirik. Dərgahımızda (hər şeyi) hifz edən bir Kitab (lövhi-məhfuz) vardır!
null.verse 50:5: Lakin onlara haqq (Qur'an) gəldikdə onu yalan saydılar. İndi onlar dolaşıqlıq (təşvış) içindədirlər (sənə gah şair, gah sehrbaz, gah da kahin deyirlər).
null.verse 50:6: Məgər onlar başlarının üstündəki göyə baxıb onu necə yaratdığımızı, necə bəzədiyimizi və orada heç bir yarıq olmadığını görmürlərmi?!
null.verse 50:7: Eləcə də yeri necə döşədiyimizi (hamarlayıb düzəltdiyimizi), orada möhkəm duran dağlar yaratdığımızı, hər cür gözəl növdən (meyvə) yetişdirdiyimizi görmürlərmi?!
null.verse 50:8: (Bütün bunlar Rəbbinə tərəf) dönüb qayıdan hər bir bəndə üçün ibrət dərsi və öyüd-nəsihət olsun deyə etdik.
null.verse 50:9: Biz göydən bərəkətli su endirdik, sonra onunla bağlar və (arpa, buğda və s. kimi) biçilən taxıl dənələri yetişdirdik.
null.verse 50:10: Həm də tumurcuqları (salxım-salxım) bir-birinin üstünə düzülmüş, hündür xurma ağacları (bitirdik) -
null.verse 50:11: Bəndələrə ruzi olsun deyə! Biz onunla (o su ilə) ölü bir məmləkəti cana gətirdik. (Qəbirlərdən dirilib) çıxmaq da belədir!
null.verse 50:12: Onlardan (Məkkə müşriklərindən) əvvəl Nuh tayfası, Rəss əhli, Səmud (qövmü peyğəmbərləri) təkzib etmişdi.
null.verse 50:13: Ad (qövmü), Fir'on (əhli), Lut qardaşları;
null.verse 50:14: Əykə əhli və Tübbə' qövmü - bunların hamısı peyğəmbərləri təkzib etdi və Mənim də onlara və'd etdiyim (əzab) gerçəkləşdi.
null.verse 50:15: Məgər Biz ilk yaradılışdan acizmi qaldıq?! Xeyr! (Eləcə də qiyamət günü ölüləri diriltməkdən aciz qalmayacağıq!) Onlar yeni yaradılış (təkrar dirilmə) barəsində şəkk-şübhə içindədirlər!
null.verse 50:16: And olsun ki, insanı Biz yaratdıq və nəfsinin ona nə vəsvəsə etdiyini də Biz bilirik. Biz ona şah damarından da yaxınıq! (İnsanın adi hərəkətlərindən tutmuş ürəyindən keçən ən gizli hisslər, duyğular belə Allaha mə'lumdur!)
null.verse 50:17: Xatırla ki, (insanın) sağında və solunda (onun bütün əməllərini) təsbit edən (qeydə alan) iki mələk oturmuşdur!
null.verse 50:18: Dediyi hər sözü (yazmaq üçün) onun yanında hazır durub gözləyən (iki mələk) vardır!
null.verse 50:19: ?lüm (ölüm bihuşluğu), həqiqətən, gələcəkdir. (Ey insan!) Bu sənin qorxub qaçdığın (cürbəcür vasitələrlə canını qurtarmaq istədiyin) şeydir!
null.verse 50:20: (?ləndən sonra yenidən dirilmək üçün) sur çalınacaqdır. Bu və'd olunmuş gündür (əzab günüdür)!
null.verse 50:21: Hər bir kəs (Rəbbinin hüzuruna) bir sürüyən (sürüyüb məhşərə gətirən) və bir də şahidlə (iki mələklə) gələcəkdir.
null.verse 50:22: (Ona belə deyiləcəkdir: ) "Sən (dünyada) bundan (bu müdhiş günə uğrayacağından) qafil idin. Artıq bu gün gözündən pərdəni götürdük. Sən bu gün sərrast görürsən!"
null.verse 50:23: Yoldaşı (ona təhkim olunmuş mələk) deyəcəkdir: "Bu yanımdakı (Cəhənnəm üçün) hazırdır!"
null.verse 50:24: (Allah o iki mələyə buyuracaqdır: ) "Atın Cəhənnəmə hər bir inadcıl kafiri;
null.verse 50:25: Xeyrə mane olanı, (zülm etməklə, günah törətməklə) həddi aşanı, (Allahın birliyinə) şəkk edəni!
null.verse 50:26: O kimsəni ki, Allahla yanaşı özünə başqa bir tanrı qəbul etdi. Atın onu şiddətli əzabın içinə!"
null.verse 50:27: Yoldaşı (Şeytan və ya öz nəfsi) deyəcəkdir: "Ey Rəbbimiz! Onu mən azdırmadım. Fəqət o özü haqq yoldan çox azmışdı!"
null.verse 50:28: (Allah) buyuracaqdır: "Mənim hüzurumda mübahisə etməyin. Mən sizə (dünyada peyğəmbər vasitəsilə) bu əzabı bildirmişdim.
null.verse 50:29: Mənim hüzurumda söz güləşdirməyin. Mən bəndələrə (əbəs yerə) zülm edən deyiləm!"
null.verse 50:30: O gün Biz Cəhənnəmə: "Doldunmu?" - deyəcək, o isə: "Yenə varmı?" - deyə cavab verəcəkdir.
null.verse 50:31: Cənnət də müttəqilər üçün yaxın bir yerə gətiriləcəkdir.
null.verse 50:32: (Onlara deyiləcəkdir: ) "Bu, və'd olunduğunuz (Cənnətdir). O, hər bir (tövbə edib Allaha tərəf) qayıdan, (nəfsini haramdan, özünü günahdan) qoruyan;
null.verse 50:33: Rəhmandan (Onu) görmədən qorxan və (Rəbbinin hüzuruna) haqqa dönmüş qəlblə gələn bəndə üçündür!
null.verse 50:34: Ora sağlıqla (əmin-amanlıqla) daxil olun. Bu, əbədiyyət günüdür!"
null.verse 50:35: Orada onlar üçün istədikləri hər şey vardır. Dərgahımızda isə ondan artığı (mö'minlərin təsəvvür edə bilmədikləri ne'mətlər, Allahın rizasını və s.) mövcuddur!
null.verse 50:36: Biz onlardan (Məkkə müşriklərindən) əvvəl özlərindən daha qüvvətli neçə-neçə nəsilləri məhv etdik. (Onlar: ) "Görəsən, (ölümdən qaçıb) can qurtarmağa bir yer varmı?" (deyərək) ölkə-ölkə gəzib dolaşmışdılar.
null.verse 50:37: Şübhəsiz ki, bunda qəlb (ağıl) sahibi, yaxud (moizə edildiyi zaman bütün varlığı ilə) hazır olub (ona cani-dildən) qulaq asan kimsə üçün öyüd-nəsihət vardır!
null.verse 50:38: And olsun ki, Biz göyləri, yeri və onların arasında olanları altı gündə yaratdıq və Bizə heç bir yorğunluq da üz vermədi.
null.verse 50:39: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) Artıq onların dediklərinə (batil sözlərinə) səbr et. Gün doğmamışdan əvvəl, batmamışdan əvvəl Rəbbini təqdis edib şə'ninə təriflər de!
null.verse 50:40: Gecənin bir vaxtında və səcdələrdən sonra da (Onu şükr-səna ilə təqdis et)!
null.verse 50:41: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) Carçının yaxın bir yerdən car çəkəcəyi gün (deyilən sözü, surun səsini) dinlə! (O gün İsrafil uca səslə: "Ey köhnəlmiş sümüklər, ey bir-birindən ayrılmış oynaqlar, ey əprimiş ətlər, ey dağılmış saçlar! Allah sizə haqq-hesab gününə gəlmək üçün yenidən birləşməyi buyurur!" - deyəcək və suru ikinci dəfə üfürəcəkdir).
null.verse 50:42: O gün (bütün yaranmışlar) dəhşətli (tükürpədici) səsi doğrudan-doğruya eşidəcəklər. O gün (qəbirlərdən) çıxma günüdür!
null.verse 50:43: Şübhəsiz ki, dirildən də, öldürən də Bizim. (Axır) dönüş də Bizim hüzurumuzadır!
null.verse 50:44: O gün yer onlardan ayrılıb parçalanacaq, onlar sür'ətlə (torpağın altından, qəbirlərindən çıxacaqlar). O bizim üçün asan olan həşrdir (Bütün yaranmışların bir yerə toplanacaqları məhşər günüdür).
null.verse 50:45: Biz onların nə dediklərini çox gözəl bilirik. (Ya Peyğəmbər!) Sən onlara zor edən (onları zorla imana gətirən) deyilsən. Sən Mənim təhdidimdən (əzabımdan) qorxablara Qur'anla öyüd-nəsihət ver!

null.verse 50:1: Kaf. Tako Mi Kur’ana slavnog,
null.verse 50:2: oni se čude što im je došao jedan od njih da ih opominje, pa, nevjernici, govore: "To je čudna stvar:
null.verse 50:3: zar kad pomremo i zemlja postanemo...? Nezamisliv je to povratak!"
null.verse 50:4: Mi znamo šta će od njih zemlja oduzeti, u nas je Knjiga u kojoj se sve čuva.
null.verse 50:5: Oni, međutim, poriču Istinu koja im dolazi i smeteni su.
null.verse 50:6: A zašto ne pogledaju nebo iznad sebe? - kako smo ga sazdali i ukrasili i kako u njemu nema nereda!
null.verse 50:7: A Zemlju smo rasprostrli i po njoj nepomična brda pobacali i dali da iz nje niče raznovrsno prekrasno bilje,
null.verse 50:8: da bi razmislio i opomenuo se svaki rob koji se Gospodaru svome obraća.
null.verse 50:9: Mi s neba spuštamo vodu kao blagoslov, i činimo da, uz pomoć njenu, niču vrtovi i žito koje se žanje
null.verse 50:10: i visoke palme u kojih su zameci nagomilani jedni iznad drugih,
null.verse 50:11: kao hranu robovima, i Mi njome oživljavamo mrtav predjel; takvo će biti i oživljenje.
null.verse 50:12: Prije njih poricali su narod Nuhov, i stanovnici Ressa, i Semud
null.verse 50:13: i Ad, i narod faraonov, i narod Lutov,
null.verse 50:14: i stanovnici Ejke i narod Tubba; svi su oni poslanike lažnim smatrali i kaznu Moju zaslužili.
null.verse 50:15: Pa zar smo prilikom prvog stvaranja malaksali? Ne, ali oni u ponovno stvaranje sumnjaju.
null.verse 50:16: Mi stvaramo čovjeka i znamo šta mu sve duša njegova haje, jer Mi smo njemu bliži od vratne žile kucavice.
null.verse 50:17: Kad se dvojica sastanu i sjednu jedan s desne, a drugi s lijeve strane,
null.verse 50:18: on ne izusti ni jednu riječ, a da pored njega nije prisutan Onaj koji bdije.
null.verse 50:19: Smrtne muke će zbilja doći - to je nešto od čega ne možeš pobjeći
null.verse 50:20: i u rog će se puhnuti - to je Dan kojim se prijeti -
null.verse 50:21: i svako će doći, a s njim i vodič i svjedok.
null.verse 50:22: Ti nisi mario za ovo, pa smo ti skinuli koprenu tvoju, danas ti je oštar vid.
null.verse 50:23: A drug njegov će reći:
null.verse 50:24: Baci u Džehennem svakog nezahvalnika, inadžiju,
null.verse 50:25: koji je branio da se čine dobra djela i koji je nasilnik i podozriv bio,
null.verse 50:26: koji je pored Allaha u drugog boga vjerovao - zato ga baci u patnju najtežu!"
null.verse 50:27: A drug njegov će reći: "Gospodaru naš, ja ga nisam silom zaveo, sam je u velikoj zabludi bio."
null.verse 50:28: Ne prepirite se preda Mnom! - reći će On - "još davno sam vam zaprijetio,
null.verse 50:29: Moja Riječ se ne mijenja i Ja nisam prema robovima svojim nepravičan."
null.verse 50:30: Na dan kada upitamo Džehennem: "Jesi li se napunio?" - on će odgovoriti: "Ima li još?"
null.verse 50:31: A Džennet će biti primaknut čestitima, neće biti ni od jednog daleko -
null.verse 50:32: Ovo je ono što vam je obećano, svakome onome koji se kajao i čuvao,
null.verse 50:33: koji se Milostivoga bojao, iako Ga nije vidio, i koji je srce odano donio.
null.verse 50:34: Uđite u nj, u miru, ovo je Dan vječni!"
null.verse 50:35: U njemu će imati što god zažele - a od Nas i više.
null.verse 50:36: A koliko smo naroda prije ovih uništili, koji su moćniji od njih bili, pa su po svijetu utočište tražili - od propasti spasa ima li?!
null.verse 50:37: U tome je, zaista, pouka za onoga ko razum ima ili ko sluša, a priseban je.
null.verse 50:38: Mi smo stvorili nebesa i Zemlju i ono što je između njih - za šest vremenskih razdoblja, i nije Nas ophrvao nikakav umor.
null.verse 50:39: Zato strpljivo podnosi ono što oni govore i veličaj Gospodara svoga i zahvaljuj Mu prije sunčeva izlaska i prije zalaska,
null.verse 50:40: i veličaj Ga noću i poslije obavljanja molitvi.
null.verse 50:41: I osluškuj! Dan kada će glasnik pozvati iz mjesta koje je blizu,
null.verse 50:42: Dan kada će oni čuti istinit glas - to će biti Dan oživljenja.
null.verse 50:43: Mi, zaista, dajemo život i dajemo smrt, i sve će se Nama vratiti!
null.verse 50:44: A na Dan kada će nad njima zemlja popucati oni će žurno izići; biće to oživljenje, za Nas lahko.
null.verse 50:45: Mi dobro znamo što oni govore; ti ih ne možeš prisiliti, nego podsjeti Kur’anom onoga koji se prijetnje Moje boji!

null.verse 50:1: ক্বাফ! সম্মানিত কোরআনের শপথ;
null.verse 50:2: বরং তারা তাদের মধ্য থেকেই একজন ভয় প্রদর্শনকারী আগমন করেছে দেখে বিস্ময় বোধ করে। অতঃপর কাফেররা বলেঃ এটা আশ্চর্যের ব্যাপার।
null.verse 50:3: আমরা মরে গেলে এবং মৃত্তিকায় পরিণত হয়ে গেলেও কি পুনরুত্থিত হব? এ প্রত্যাবর্তন সুদূরপরাহত।
null.verse 50:4: মৃত্তিকা তাদের কতটুকু গ্রাস করবে, তা আমার জানা আছে এবং আমার কাছে আছে সংরক্ষিত কিতাব।
null.verse 50:5: বরং তাদের কাছে সত্য আগমন করার পর তারা তাকে মিথ্যা বলছে। ফলে তারা সংশয়ে পতিত রয়েছে।
null.verse 50:6: তারা কি তাদের উপরস্থিত আকাশের পানে দৃষ্টিপাত করে না আমি কিভাবে তা নির্মাণ করেছি এবং সুশোভিত করেছি? তাতে কোন ছিদ্রও নেই।
null.verse 50:7: আমি ভূমিকে বিস্তৃত করেছি, তাতে পর্বতমালার ভার স্থাপন করেছি এবং তাতে সর্বপ্রকার নয়নাভিরাম উদ্ভিদ উদগত করেছি।
null.verse 50:8: এটা জ্ঞান আহরণ ও স্মরণ করার মত ব্যাপার প্রত্যেক অনুরাগী বান্দার জন্যে।
null.verse 50:9: আমি আকাশ থেকে কল্যাণময় বৃষ্টি বর্ষণ করি এবং তদ্বারা বাগান ও শস্য উদগত করি, যেগুলোর ফসল আহরণ করা হয়।
null.verse 50:10: এবং লম্বমান খর্জুর বৃক্ষ, যাতে আছে গুচ্ছ গুচ্ছ খর্জুর,
null.verse 50:11: বান্দাদের জীবিকাস্বরূপ এবং বৃষ্টি দ্বারা আমি মৃত জনপদকে সঞ্জীবিত করি। এমনিভাবে পুনরুত্থান ঘটবে।
null.verse 50:12: তাদের পূর্বে মিথ্যাবাদী বলেছে নূহের সম্প্রদায়, কুপবাসীরা এবং সামুদ সম্প্রদায়।
null.verse 50:13: আদ, ফেরাউন, ও লূতের সম্প্রদায়,
null.verse 50:14: বনবাসীরা এবং তোব্বা সম্প্রদায়। প্রত্যেকেই রসূলগণকে মিথ্যা বলেছে, অতঃপর আমার শাস্তির যোগ্য হয়েছে।
null.verse 50:15: আমি কি প্রথমবার সৃষ্টি করেই ক্লান্ত হয়ে পড়েছি? বরং তারা নতুন সৃষ্টির ব্যাপারে সন্দেহ পোষন করেছে।
null.verse 50:16: আমি মানুষ সৃষ্টি করেছি এবং তার মন নিভৃতে যে কুচিন্তা করে, সে সম্বন্ধেও আমি অবগত আছি। আমি তার গ্রীবাস্থিত ধমনী থেকেও অধিক নিকটবর্তী।
null.verse 50:17: যখন দুই ফেরেশতা ডানে ও বামে বসে তার আমল গ্রহণ করে।
null.verse 50:18: সে যে কথাই উচ্চারণ করে, তাই গ্রহণ করার জন্যে তার কাছে সদা প্রস্তুত প্রহরী রয়েছে।
null.verse 50:19: মৃত্যুযন্ত্রণা নিশ্চিতই আসবে। এ থেকেই তুমি টালবাহানা করতে।
null.verse 50:20: এবং শিঙ্গায় ফুঁৎকার দেয়া হবে এটা হবে ভয় প্রদর্শনের দিন।
null.verse 50:21: প্রত্যেক ব্যক্তি আগমন করবে। তার সাথে থাকবে চালক ও কর্মের সাক্ষী।
null.verse 50:22: তুমি তো এই দিন সম্পর্কে উদাসীন ছিলে। এখন তোমার কাছ থেকে যবনিকা সরিয়ে দিয়েছি। ফলে আজ তোমার দৃষ্টি সুতীক্ষ্ন।
null.verse 50:23: তার সঙ্গী ফেরেশতা বলবেঃ আমার কাছে যে, আমলনামা ছিল, তা এই।
null.verse 50:24: তোমরা উভয়েই নিক্ষেপ কর জাহান্নামে প্রত্যেক অকৃতজ্ঞ বিরুদ্ধবাদীকে,
null.verse 50:25: যে বাধা দিত মঙ্গলজনক কাজে, সীমালঙ্ঘনকারী, সন্দেহ পোষণকারীকে।
null.verse 50:26: যে ব্যক্তি আল্লাহর সাথে অন্য উপাস্য গ্রহণ করত, তাকে তোমরা কঠিন শাস্তিতে নিক্ষেপ কর।
null.verse 50:27: তার সঙ্গী শয়তান বলবেঃ হে আমাদের পালনকর্তা, আমি তাকে অবাধ্যতায় লিপ্ত করিনি। বস্তুতঃ সে নিজেই ছিল সুদূর পথভ্রান্তিতে লিপ্ত।
null.verse 50:28: আল্লাহ বলবেনঃ আমার সামনে বাকবিতন্ডা করো না আমি তো পূর্বেই তোমাদেরকে আযাব দ্বারা ভয় প্রদর্শন করেছিলাম।
null.verse 50:29: আমার কাছে কথা রদবদল হয় না এবং আমি বান্দাদের প্রতি জুলুমকারী নই।
null.verse 50:30: যেদিন আমি জাহান্নামকে জিজ্ঞাসা করব; তুমি কি পূর্ণ হয়ে গেছ? সে বলবেঃ আরও আছে কি?
null.verse 50:31: জান্নাতকে উপস্থিত করা হবে খোদাভীরুদের অদূরে।
null.verse 50:32: তোমাদের প্রত্যেক অনুরাগী ও স্মরণকারীকে এরই প্রতিশ্রুতি দেয়া হয়েছিল।
null.verse 50:33: যে না দেখে দয়াময় আল্লাহ তা’আলাকে ভয় করত এবং বিনীত অন্তরে উপস্থিত হত।
null.verse 50:34: তোমরা এতে শান্তিতে প্রবেশ কর। এটাই অনন্তকাল বসবাসের জন্য প্রবেশ করার দিন।
null.verse 50:35: তারা তথায় যা চাইবে, তাই পাবে এবং আমার কাছে রয়েছে আরও অধিক।
null.verse 50:36: আমি তাদের পূর্বে বহু সম্প্রদায়কে ধ্বংস করেছি, তারা এদের অপেক্ষা অধিক শক্তিশালী ছিল এবং দেশে-বিদেশে বিচরণ করে ফিরত। তাদের কোন পলায়ন স্থান ছিল না।
null.verse 50:37: এতে উপদেশ রয়েছে তার জন্যে, যার অনুধাবন করার মত অন্তর রয়েছে। অথবা সে নিবিষ্ট মনে শ্রবণ করে।
null.verse 50:38: আমি নভোমন্ডল, ভূমন্ডল ও এতদুভয়ের মধ্যবর্তী সবকিছু ছয়দিনে সৃষ্টি করেছি এবং আমাকে কোনরূপ ক্লান্তি স্পর্শ করেনি।
null.verse 50:39: অতএব, তারা যা কিছু বলে, তজ্জন্যে আপনি ছবর করুন এবং, সূর্যোদয় ও সূর্যাস্তের পূর্বে আপনার পালনকর্তার সপ্রশংস পবিত্রতা ঘোষণা করুন।
null.verse 50:40: রাত্রির কিছু অংশে তাঁর পবিত্রতা ঘোষণা করুন এবং নামাযের পশ্চাতেও।
null.verse 50:41: শুন, যে দিন এক আহবানকারী নিকটবর্তী স্থান থেকে আহবান করবে।
null.verse 50:42: যেদিন মানুষ নিশ্চিত সেই ভয়াবহ আওয়াজ শুনতে পাবে, সেদিনই পুনরত্থান দিবস।
null.verse 50:43: আমি জীবন দান করি, মৃত্যু ঘটাই এবং আমারই দিকে সকলের প্রত্যাবর্তন।
null.verse 50:44: যেদিন ভূমন্ডল বিদীর্ণ হয়ে মানুষ ছুটাছুটি করে বের হয়ে আসবে। এটা এমন সমবেত করা, যা আমার জন্যে অতি সহজ।
null.verse 50:45: তারা যা বলে, তা আমি সম্যক অবগত আছি। আপনি তাদের উপর জোরজবরকারী নন। অতএব, যে আমার শাস্তিকে ভয় করে, তাকে কোরআনের মাধ্যমে উপদেশ দান করুন।

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:1: Каф. Кълна се в славния Коран.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:2: Да, учудиха се, че им се яви предупредител измежду тях. И рекоха неверниците: Това е чудно нещо.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:3: Нима след като умрем и станем на пръст [ще бъдем възкресени]? Такова завръщане е невероятно.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:4: Знаем Ние какво земята отнема от тях и имаме съхраняваща Книга.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:5: Ала те взеха за лъжа истината, когато дойде при тях и са в недоумение.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:6: Нима не виждат небето над тях, как Ние го изградихме и го украсихме, и е без процепи?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:7: И земята разпростряхме, и положихме по нея непоклатими планини, и сторихме от нея да поникнат всякакви прекрасни видове -
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:8: поука и напомняне за всеки покайващ се раб.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:9: И изсипваме от небето благословена вода, и сторваме да израстват чрез нея градини и зърно за жътва,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:10: и високи палми с гроздове, скупчени един връз друг -
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:11: препитание за рабите. И съживяваме с нея мъртва земя. Така ще бъде и възкресението.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:12: Преди тях смятаха, че е лъжа и народът на Нух, и обитателите на ар-Рас, и самудяните,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:13: и адитите, и Фараонът, и братята на Лут,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:14: и обитателите на Горичката, и народът на Туббаа. Всички смятаха за лъжци пратениците и се изпълни Моето обещание.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:15: Нима Ни затрудни първото сътворяване? Ала се съмняват те в новото сътворяване.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:16: Сътворихме Ние човека и знаем какво му нашепва неговата душа. Ние сме по-близо до него, отколкото вената на шията .
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:17: Отдясно и отляво на него стоят два записващи ангела,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:18: не изрича и една дума, без да има готов надзорник при него.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:19: И смъртната агония ще донесе истината: Това е, което си избягвал.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:20: И ще се протръби с Рога. Това е Денят на обещанието!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:21: И с всеки човек ще дойде водач и свидетел [от ангелите].
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:22: [И ще му се каже:] Ти нехаеше за това. Но снехме от теб покривалото и твоят поглед Днес е проницателен.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:23: А съпътствалият го [ангел] ще каже: Готово е това, което е у мен.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:26: който прие за бог друг заедно с Аллах! Затова го хвърлете в суровото мъчение!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:27: Съпътствалият го [сатана] ще каже: Господи наш, не аз го накарах да престъпва, а сам той бе в дълбока заблуда.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:28: Ще каже [Аллах]: Не се карайте пред Мен! Аз ви предупреждавах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:29: Не се променя Моето Слово. И не съм угнетител на рабите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:30: В този Ден ще кажем на Ада: Напълни ли се? А той ще рече: Има ли още?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:31: И не след дълго Раят ще бъде приближен за богобоязливите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:32: Това е, което ви бе обещано - за всеки покайващ се, спазващ ,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:33: който и в уединение се бои от Всемилостивия, и идва със сърце, молещо за прошка.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:34: Влезте тук в мир! Това е Денят на вечността!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:35: Ще имат там, каквото пожелаят, а при Нас има повече.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:36: И колко поколения преди тях погубихме, а бяха по-силни от тях и обикаляха по земята! Но има ли избавление?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:37: Наистина в това се съдържа поука за всеки, който има сърце или се вслушва и е свидетел.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:38: Сътворихме Ние небесата и земята, и всичко между тях в шест дни, без да Ни засегне умора.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:39: Бъди търпелив към това, което казват, и прославяй с възхвала своя Господ преди изгрева на слънцето и преди залеза!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:40: И през нощта Го прославяй, и след поклоните!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:41: И вслушвай се в Деня, когато прогласяващият ще прогласи от близко място!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:42: В този Ден ще чуят Вика с истината. Това е Денят на възкресението.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:43: Ние съживяваме и Ние умъртвяваме, и при Нас е завръщането.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:44: В този Ден земята ще се разцепи над тях - забързани. Това е събиране, лесно за Нас.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 50:45: Най-добре Ние знаем какво изричат. А ти не си за тях принудител. И поучавай с Корана всеки, който се страхува от Моето предупреждение!

null.verse 50:1: 戛弗。以尊嚴的《古蘭經》盟誓，
null.verse 50:2: 難道他們因同族的警告者來臨他們而惊訝嗎？不信道的人們說：「這是奇事！
null.verse 50:3: 難道我們既死之後，已變塵土，還要還原嗎？那太不近情理了。」
null.verse 50:4: 我確己知道大地對於他們的剝蝕，我這裡有一本被保護的天經。
null.verse 50:5: 他們否認已降示他們的真理，所以他們陷於混亂的狀態中。
null.verse 50:6: 難道他們沒有仰觀天體嗎？我是怎樣建造它，點綴它，使它沒有缺陷的？
null.verse 50:7: 我曾展開大地，並將許多山岳投在上面，還使各種美麗的植物生長出來，
null.verse 50:8: 為的是啟發和教誨每個歸依的僕人。
null.verse 50:9: 我從雲中降下吉祥的雨水，就借它而生長許多果樹和五穀，
null.verse 50:10: 並生長扶疏的海棗樹，它有累累的果實，
null.verse 50:11: 用作眾僕的給養。我借雨水而使它已死的地方復活。死人的復活也是這樣的。
null.verse 50:12: 在他們之前否認使者的人，在努哈的宗族、蘭斯的居民、賽莫德人、
null.verse 50:13: 阿德人、法老、魯特的同胞、
null.verse 50:14: 叢林的居民和圖白的百姓，統統都否認過使者，故我所警告的刑罰，是必然降臨的。
null.verse 50:15: 我曾因創造而疲倦嗎？不然，他們對於再造，是在疑惑中的。
null.verse 50:16: 我確已創造人，我知道他心中的妄想；我比他的命脈還近於他。
null.verse 50:17: 當坐在右邊和左邊的兩個記錄的天神記錄各人的言行的時候，
null.verse 50:18: 他每說一句話，他面前都有天神當場監察。
null.verse 50:19: 臨死的昏迷，將昭示真理。這是你一向所逃避的。
null.verse 50:20: 號角將吹響，那是警告實現之日。
null.verse 50:21: 每個人都要到來，驅逐的天神和見証的天神，將與他同行。
null.verse 50:22: 你確忽視此事，現在我已揭開你的蒙蔽，所以你今日的眼光是銳利的。
null.verse 50:23: 他的伙伴將說：「這在我面前是現成的。」
null.verse 50:24: 你們倆所應當投入火獄的，是每個孤負者、頑固者、
null.verse 50:25: 慳吝者、過分者、懷疑者、
null.verse 50:26: 以別的神靈與真主同受崇拜者；你們倆將他投入嚴厲的刑罰吧！
null.verse 50:27: 他的伙伴將說：「我的主啊！我沒有使他放蕩，但他自陷於不近情理的迷誤中。」
null.verse 50:28: 主將說：「你們不要在我面前爭論，我確已預先警告你們了。
null.verse 50:29: 我的判詞，是不可變更的，我絕不是虧枉眾僕的。」
null.verse 50:30: 在那日，我將對火獄說：「你已填滿了嗎？」它將說：「還有增加的嗎？」
null.verse 50:31: 樂園將被移到敬畏者的附近，離得不遠。
null.verse 50:32: 這是你們所被應許的，這是賞賜每個歸依的守禮者的。
null.verse 50:33: 秘密敬畏至仁主，且帶歸依的心而來者，
null.verse 50:34: 你們平安地進入樂園吧！這是永居開始之日。
null.verse 50:35: 他們在樂園裡，將有他們意欲的；而且我在那裡還有加賜。
null.verse 50:36: 在他們之前，我毀滅了許多比他們更強悍的世代！他們曾在各地旅行，難道有什麼避死的地方嗎？
null.verse 50:37: 對於有心靈者，或專心靜聽者，此中確有一種教訓。
null.verse 50:38: 我在六日內確已創造了天地萬物，我沒有感覺一點疲倦。
null.verse 50:39: 故你應當忍受他們所說的讕言。在日出和日落之前，你應當讚頌你的主；
null.verse 50:40: 在夜間和叩頭後，你應當讚頌他。
null.verse 50:41: 你應當傾聽，在喊叫者從近處喊叫之日，
null.verse 50:42: 在他們聽見包含真理的吶喊之日，那是從墳中出來之日。
null.verse 50:43: 我確是使人生、使人死的，我確是最後的歸宿。
null.verse 50:44: 在大地破裂而他們迅速走出墳墓之日，那集合的事對於我是容易的。
null.verse 50:45: 我全知他們所說的讕言，你不能強制他們，故你應當以《古蘭經》教誨畏懼我的警告的人們。

null.verse 50:1: Qáf. Při Koránu oslavovaném!
null.verse 50:2: Ba naopak, oni se diví, že k nim přišel varovatel z jejich středu; a hovoří nevěřící: "To je věc podivná!
null.verse 50:3: Jak to, že až zemřeme a staneme se prachem...? To bude ale návrat z daleka!"
null.verse 50:4: My dobře víme, které z nich země pohltila, neboť máme knihu, jež záznamy střeží.
null.verse 50:5: A naopak za lež pravdu prohlašovali, když přišla k nim, a jsou teď v zamotaném postavení.
null.verse 50:6: Což se nepodívali na nebe nad sebou, jak jsme je zbudovali a ozdobili a že není na něm žádných trhlin?
null.verse 50:7: A zemi jsme rozprostřeli a po ní pevně stojící hory rozhodili a na ní vyrůst jsme dali druhům všem překrásných rostlin
null.verse 50:8: pro potěchu očí i jako připomenutí pro každého služebníka kajícného.
null.verse 50:9: A seslali jsme z nebe vodu požehnanou, z níž dali jsme vyrůst zahradám i zrní, jež dává úrodu
null.verse 50:10: a palmám ztepilým, jež v řadách nesou trsy plodů,
null.verse 50:11: jako obživu služebníkům Našim. A vodou oživujeme i mrtvou zem, a takové bude i vaše vzkříšení.
null.verse 50:12: A již před nimi to vše za lež prohlašoval lid Noemův, obyvatelé ar-Rassu i Thamúdovci,
null.verse 50:13: ´Ádovci, Faraón i Lotovi soukmenovci,
null.verse 50:14: lidé Houštin i národ tubba´ů - ti všichni posly za lháře prohlásili, však uskutečnila se hrozba nad nimi.
null.verse 50:15: Cožpak jsme byli prvním stvořením zmoženi? A přece oni pochybují o novém stvoření!
null.verse 50:16: My stvořili jsme člověka a dobře víme, co duše jeho mu našeptává. Vždyť blíže jsme mu než jeho tepna krční,
null.verse 50:17: když přijímají jeho slova dva andělé, zprava i zleva sedící.
null.verse 50:18: A člověk nevyřkne slovo jediné, aniž je vedle něho připraven dohlížitel.
null.verse 50:19: A pak dostaví se smrti opilost jako skutečnost a tohle je to, čemu ses vyhnout chtěl!
null.verse 50:20: A bude na pozoun zatroubeno - a to bude den trestu slíbeného!
null.verse 50:21: A každá duše se dostaví majíc s sebou průvodce a svědka jednoho.
null.verse 50:22: Dosud lhostejný jsi byl k tomuto dni, ale sňali jsme ti roušku tvou, takže zrak tvůj se dnes zaostřil.
null.verse 50:23: A řekne jeho věrný druh: "Tady je to, co jsem u sebe ze svědectví připravil!"
null.verse 50:24: Vy dva do pekla vhoďte každého nevěřícího zarputilého,
null.verse 50:25: bránícího dobrému, nepřátelského a pochybovačného,
null.verse 50:26: který vedle Boha jiná božstva postavil! Vhoďte jej do trestu strašného!"
null.verse 50:27: A řekne jeho věrný druh: "Pane náš, já jsem ho nesváděl, to on sám v dalekém bloudění byl."
null.verse 50:28: I řekne Bůh: "Nehádejte se tu přede mnou, vždyť jsem vás již dříve o své hrozbě uvědomil!
null.verse 50:29: Slovo Mé je nezměnitelné a já neukřivdím žádnému svému služebníku
null.verse 50:30: v den, kdy pekla se zeptáme:, Jsi již naplněno?? a ono odpoví:, Je ještě přírůstek nějaký?? "
null.verse 50:31: A přiblížen bude bohabojným ráj nedaleký
null.verse 50:32: a bude řečeno: "Toto je to, co vám bylo slíbeno... všem kajícníkům zákonů dbalým,
null.verse 50:33: kteří v tajnosti se Milosrdného obávají a přicházejí se srdcem pokorným.
null.verse 50:34: Vstupte tam v míru, toto je den nesmrtelnosti!"
null.verse 50:35: A čehokoliv se jim tam zachce, budou mít, a u Nás je ještě přídavek v hojnosti!
null.verse 50:36: A kolik jsme již zahubili před nimi pokolení, jež mocnější než oni byla silou! Hledejte tedy v zemích všech, zda naleznete útočiště!
null.verse 50:37: V tom věru je připomenutí pro toho, kdo ruce má či uši nastavuje a je sám svědkem očitým.
null.verse 50:38: Stvořili jsme nebesa a zemi a to, co je mezi nimi, v šesti dnech, aniž se nás dotkla únava.
null.verse 50:39: Snášej trpělivě jejich řeči a před slunce východem a západem oslavuj chválu svého Pána
null.verse 50:40: a v noci též Jej oslavuj i na konci každého padnutí na zem!
null.verse 50:41: A naslouchej dni, kdy hlasatel zavolá z místa blízkého;
null.verse 50:42: ten den, kdy zaslechnou křik skutečně, to bude den vzkříšení.
null.verse 50:43: My věru život i smrt dáváme a u Nás je cíl konečný.
null.verse 50:44: V den, kdy se země rozpoltí, vyvrhne je se spěchem a bude pro nás toto shromáždění činem snadným;
null.verse 50:45: my nejlépe známe, co hovoří, a ty nejsi ustanoven, abys je nutil násilím. Připomínej tedy pomocí Koránu těm, kdo hrozby Mé se obávají.

null.verse 50:1: Qaaf. Bij de glorierijke Koran.
null.verse 50:2: Maar zij verwonderen zich dat er uit e hun midden een waarschuwer tot hen kwam. En de ongelovigen zeggen: "Dit is een zonderling iets!
null.verse 50:3: Zullen wij in het leven worden geroepen wanneer wij dood gaan en stof zijn geworden? Zulk een terugkeer is onmogelijk."
null.verse 50:4: Wij weten wat de aarde van hen verteert en bij Ons is een Boek dat alles bewaart.
null.verse 50:5: Neen, zij hebben de Waarheid verloochend toen deze tot hen kwam, derhalve zijn zij in een verwarde toestand geraakt.
null.verse 50:6: Zien zij niet naar de hemel boven hen hoe Wij deze hebben opgericht en versierd en dat dezelve geen gebreken heeft?
null.verse 50:7: En de aarde - Wij hebben haar uitgespreid en stevige bergen er op gevestigd en Wij hebben er elk prachtig gewas op doen groeien.
null.verse 50:8: Als inzicht en les voor iedere dienaar die zich er toe wendt.
null.verse 50:9: En Wij zenden water vol zegeningen uit de hemel neder en Wij brengen daarmee tuinen en graan voort waarvan kan worden geoogst
null.verse 50:10: En hoge palmbomen met bloeikolve over elkander gegroeid
null.verse 50:11: Als voorziening voor Onze dienaren en Wij verkwikken daarmee een dood land. - Zo zal ook de Opstanding zijn.
null.verse 50:12: Vóór hen verloochende ook het volk van Noach, de mensen van de Bron en het volk van Samoed,
null.verse 50:13: Het volk van Aad, en Pharao en de broeders van Lot eveneens,
null.verse 50:14: En de Bosbewoners, en het volk van Tobba, elk hunner verloochende de boodschapper. Daarom ging de bedreiging in vervulling.
null.verse 50:15: Zijn Wij dan uitgeput door de eerste schepping? Neen, zij zijn in twijfel omtrent de nieuwe schepping.
null.verse 50:16: En voorzeker, Wij hebben de mens geschapen en Wij weten alles wat zijn Ik hem toefluistert. En Wij zijn nader tot hem dan zijn halsader.
null.verse 50:17: Wanneer de twee (engelen) die te boek stellen, schrijven, zit de een aan de rechter-, de andere aan de linkerzijde.
null.verse 50:18: Hij uit geen woord of er is een bewaker bij hem, die altijd klaar staat.
null.verse 50:19: En de bezwijming des doods komt waarlijk. "Dit is hetgeen gij wildet ontvrluchten."
null.verse 50:20: En er zal op de bazuin worden geblazen. "Dit is de Dag der Bedreiging."
null.verse 50:21: En iedere ziel zal tezamen komen met een geleider en een getuige.
null.verse 50:22: Er zal worden gezegd: "Gij waart hieromtrent achteloos. Nu hebben Wij uw sluier van u weggenomen en uw oog ziet deze Dag scherp."
null.verse 50:23: En zijn metgezel zal zeggen: "Dit is hetgeen bij mij gereed is."
null.verse 50:24: "Werpt, werpt in de hel elke ondankbare vijand.
null.verse 50:25: "Die het goede belette, de overtreder, de twijfelaar,
null.verse 50:26: "Die een andere God naast God oprichtte, doet hem de strenge marteling ondergaan."
null.verse 50:27: Zijn metgezel zal zeggen: "O, onze Heer, ik maakte hem niet opstandig maar hij was te ver afgedwaald."
null.verse 50:28: God zal antwoorden: "Redetwist niet in Mijn tegenwoordigheid, terwijl Ik u de waarschuwing vooraf heb gezonden.
null.verse 50:29: Het vonnis door Mij geveld kan niet worden veranderd en Ik ben in het geheel niet onrechtvaardig jegens Mijn dienaren."
null.verse 50:30: Op die Dag zullen Wij tot de hel zeggen: "Zijt gij gevuld?" En zij zal antwoorden: "Is er nog iets?"
null.verse 50:31: En de Hemel zal dicht bij de rechtvaardigen worden gebracht en niet ver verwijderd.
null.verse 50:32: Dit is hetgeen was beloofd voor een ieder die zich bekeerde en die waakzaam was,
null.verse 50:33: Die de Barmhartige in het verborgene vreesde en met een berouwvol hart tot Hem kwam.
null.verse 50:34: Gaat hier in vrede binnen. Dit is de Dag der Eeuwigheid.
null.verse 50:35: Voor hen zal daarin zijn wat zij wensen en bij Ons is nog meer.
null.verse 50:36: Maar hoevele geslachten hebben Wij (niet) vóór hen vernietigd, die machtiger in gezag waren dan dezen! Zij trokken door het land, maar was er een toevluchtsoord voor hen?
null.verse 50:37: Daarin is voorwaar een vermaning voor hem die een hart heeft of die luistert en oplettend is.
null.verse 50:38: En voorwaar, Wij schiepen de hemelen en de aarde en alles wat er tussen is in zes dagen en geen vermoeidheid raakte Ons.
null.verse 50:39: Heb dus geduld met wat zij zeggen en verheerlijk uw Heer met de lof die Hem toekomt, vóór zonsop- en ondergang.
null.verse 50:40: En verheerlijk Hem ’s nachts en na de gebeden.
null.verse 50:41: En luister! De Dag, waarop de omroeper vanuit een dichtbijzijnde plaats zal roepen,
null.verse 50:42: De Dag, waarop zij de kreet in werkelijkheid zullen horen, dat zal de Tijd zijn van het voor den dag komen.
null.verse 50:43: Voorwaar, Wij zijn het die leven geven en de dood veroorzaken, en tot Ons is de terugkeer.
null.verse 50:44: De Dag, waarop de aarde onder hen vaneen zal splijten, is het verzamelen gemakkelijk voor Ons.
null.verse 50:45: Wij weten het beste wat zij zeggen en gij zijt er niet om hen te dwingen. Vermaan dus met de Koran hem die Mijn bedreiging vreest.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:2: Nay, but they marvel that a warner of their own hath come unto them; and the disbelievers say: This is a strange thing:
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:3: When we are dead and have become dust (shall we be brought back again) ? That would be a far return!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:4: We know that which the earth taketh of them, and with Us is a recording Book.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:5: Nay, but they have denied the truth when it came unto them, therefor they are now in troubled case.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:6: Have they not then observed the sky above them, how We have constructed it and beautified it, and how there are no rifts therein ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:7: And the earth have We spread out, and have flung firm hills therein, and have caused of every lovely kind to grow thereon,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:8: A vision and a reminder for every penitent slave.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:9: And We send down from the sky blessed water whereby We give growth unto gardens and the grain of crops,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:10: And lofty date-palms with ranged clusters,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:11: Provision (made) for men; and therewith We quicken a dead land. Even so will be the resurrection of the dead.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:12: The folk of Noah denied (the truth) before them, and (so did) the dwellers at Ar-Rass and (the tribe of) Thamud,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:13: And (the tribe of) A’ad, and Pharaoh, and the brethren of Lot,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:14: And the dwellers in the wood, and the folk of Tubb’a: every one denied their messengers, therefor My threat took effect.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:15: Were We then worn out by the first creation ? Yet they are in doubt about a new creation.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:16: We verily created man and We know what his soul whispereth to him, and We are nearer to him than his jugular vein.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:17: When the two Receivers receive (him), seated on the right hand and on the left,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:18: He uttereth no word but there is with him an observer ready.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:19: And the agony of death cometh in truth. (And it is said unto him): This is that which thou wast wont to shun.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:20: And the trumpet is blown. This is the threatened Day.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:21: And every soul cometh, along with it a driver and a witness.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:22: (And unto the evil-doer it is said): Thou wast in heedlessness of this. Now We have removed from thee thy covering, and piercing is thy sight this day.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:23: And (unto the evil-doer) his comrade saith: This is that which I have ready (as testimony).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:24: (And it is said): Do ye twain hurl to hell each rebel ingrate,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:26: Who setteth up another god along with Allah. Do ye twain hurl him to the dreadful doom.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:27: His comrade saith: Our Lord! I did not cause him to rebel, but he was (himself) far gone in error.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:28: He saith: Contend not in My presence, when I had already proffered unto you the warning.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:29: The sentence that cometh from Me cannot be changed, and I am in no wise a tyrant unto the slaves.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:30: On the day when We say unto hell: Art thou filled ? and it saith: Can there be more to come ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:31: And the Garden is brought nigh for those who kept from evil, no longer distant.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:32: (And it is said): This is that which ye were promised. (It is) for every penitent and heedful one,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:33: Who feareth the Beneficent in secret and cometh with a contrite heart.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:34: Enter it in peace. This is the day of immortality.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:35: There they have all that they desire, and there is more with Us.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:36: And how many a generation We destroyed before them, who were mightier than these in prowess so that they overran the lands! Had they any place of refuge (when the judgment came) ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:37: Lo! therein verily is a reminder for him who hath a heart, or giveth ear with full intelligence.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:38: And verily We created the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them, in six Days, and naught of weariness touched Us.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:39: Therefor (O Muhammad) bear with what they say, and hymn the praise of thy Lord before the rising and before the setting of the sun;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:40: And in the night-time hymn His praise, and after the (prescribed) prostrations.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:41: And listen on the day when the crier crieth from a near place,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:42: The day when they will hear the (Awful) Cry in truth. That is the day of coming forth (from the graves).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:43: Lo! We it is Who quicken and give death, and unto Us is the journeying.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:44: On the day when the earth splitteth asunder from them, hastening forth (they come). That is a gathering easy for Us (to make).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 50:45: We are Best Aware of what they say, and thou (O Muhammad) art in no wise a compeller over them. But warn by the Qur’an him who feareth My threat.

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:1: Qaf: By the Glorious Qur’an (Thou art God’s Apostle).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:2: But they wonder that there has come to them a Warner from among themselves. So the Unbelievers say: "This is a wonderful thing!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:3: "What! When we die and become dust, (shall we live again?) That is a (sort of) return far (from our understanding)."
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:4: We already know how much of them the earth takes away: With Us is a record guarding (the full account).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:5: But they deny the Truth when it comes to them: so they are in a confused state.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:6: Do they not look at the sky above them?- How We have made it and adorned it, and there are no flaws in it?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:7: And the earth- We have spread it out, and set thereon mountains standing firm, and produced therein every kind of beautiful growth (in pairs)-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:8: To be observed and commemorated by every devotee turning (to God).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:9: And We send down from the sky rain charted with blessing, and We produce therewith gardens and Grain for harvests;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:10: And tall (and stately) palm-trees, with shoots of fruit-stalks, piled one over another;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:11: As sustenance for (God’s) Servants;- and We give (new) life therewith to land that is dead: Thus will be the Resurrection.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:12: Before them was denied (the Hereafter) by the People of Noah, the Companions of the Rass, the Thamud,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:13: The ’Ad, Pharaoh, the brethren of Lut,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:14: The Companions of the Wood, and the People of Tubba’; each one (of them) rejected the apostles, and My warning was duly fulfilled (in them).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:15: Were We then weary with the first Creation, that they should be in confused doubt about a new Creation?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:16: It was We Who created man, and We know what dark suggestions his soul makes to him: for We are nearer to him than (his) jugular vein.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:17: Behold, two (guardian angels) appointed to learn (his doings) learn (and noted them), one sitting on the right and one on the left.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:18: Not a word does he utter but there is a sentinel by him, ready (to note it).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:19: And the stupor of death will bring Truth (before his eyes): "This was the thing which thou wast trying to escape!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:20: And the Trumpet shall be blown: that will be the Day whereof Warning (had been given).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:21: And there will come forth every soul: with each will be an (angel) to drive, and an (angel) to bear witness.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:22: (It will be said:) "Thou wast heedless of this; now have We removed thy veil, and sharp is thy sight this Day!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:23: And his Companion will say: "Here is (his Record) ready with me!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:24: (The sentence will be:) "Throw, throw into Hell every contumacious Rejecter (of God)!-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:25: "Who forbade what was good, transgressed all bounds, cast doubts and suspicions;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:26: "Who set up another god beside God: Throw him into a severe penalty."
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:27: His Companion will say: "Our Lord! I did not make him transgress, but he was (himself) far astray."
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:28: He will say: "Dispute not with each other in My Presence: I had already in advance sent you Warning.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:29: "The Word changes not before Me, and I do not the least injustice to My Servants."
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:30: One Day We will ask Hell, "Art thou filled to the full?" It will say, "Are there any more (to come)?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:31: And the Garden will be brought nigh to the Righteous,- no more a thing distant.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:32: (A voice will say:) "This is what was promised for you,- for every one who turned (to God) in sincere repentance, who kept (His Law),
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:33: "Who feared (God) Most Gracious Unseen, and brought a heart turned in devotion (to Him):
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:34: "Enter ye therein in Peace and Security; this is a Day of Eternal Life!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:35: There will be for them therein all that they wish,- and more besides in Our Presence.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:36: But how many generations before them did We destroy (for their sins),- stronger in power than they? Then did they wander through the land: was there any place of escape (for them)?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:37: Verily in this is a Message for any that has a heart and understanding or who gives ear and earnestly witnesses (the truth).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:38: We created the heavens and the earth and all between them in Six Days, nor did any sense of weariness touch Us.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:39: Bear, then, with patience, all that they say, and celebrate the praises of thy Lord, before the rising of the sun and before (its) setting.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:40: And during part of the night, (also,) celebrate His praises, and (so likewise) after the postures of adoration.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:41: And listen for the Day when the Caller will call out from a place quiet near,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:42: The Day when they will hear a (mighty) Blast in (very) truth: that will be the Day of Resurrection.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:43: Verily it is We Who give Life and Death; and to Us is the Final Goal-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:44: The Day when the Earth will be rent asunder, from (men) hurrying out: that will be a gathering together,- quite easy for Us.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 50:45: We know best what they say; and thou art not one to overawe them by force. So admonish with the Qur’an such as fear My Warning!

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:2: Nay, but they marvel that a warner has come to them from among them; and the unbelievers say, ’This is a marvellous thing!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:3: What, when we are dead and become dust? That is a far returning!’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:4: We know what the earth diminishes of them; with Us is a book recording.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:5: Nay, but they cried lies to the truth when it came to them, and so they are in a case confused.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:6: What, have they not beheld heaven above them, how We have built it, and decked it out fair, and it has no cracks?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:7: And the earth -- We stretched it forth, and cast on it firm mountains, and We caused to grow therein of every joyous kind
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:8: for an insight and a reminder to every penitent servant.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:9: And We sent down out of heaven water blessed, and caused to grow thereby gardens and grain of harvest
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:10: and tall palm-trees with spathes compact,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:11: a provision for the servants, and thereby We revived a land that was dead. Even so is the coming forth.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:12: Cried lies before them the people of Noah and the men of Er-Rass, and Thamood,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:13: and Ad and Pharaoh, the brothers of Lot,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:14: the men of the Thicket, the people of Tubba’. Every one cried lies to the Messengers, and My threat came true.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:15: What, were We wearied by the first creation? No indeed; but they are in uncertainty as to the new creation.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:16: We indeed created man; and We know what his soul whispers within him, and We are nearer to him than the jugular vein.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:17: When the two angels meet together, sitting one on the right, and one on the left,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:18: not a word he utters, but by him is an observer ready.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:19: And death’s agony comes in truth; that is what thou wast shunning!
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:20: And the Trumpet shall be blown; that is the Day of the Threat.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:21: And every soul shall come, and with it a driver and a witness.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:22: ’Thou wast heedless of this; therefore We have now removed from thee thy covering, and so thy sight today is piercing.’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:23: And his comrade shall say, ’This is what I have, made ready.’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:24: ’Cast, you twain, into Gehenna every froward unbeliever,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:25: every hinderer of the good, transgressor, disquieter,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:26: who set up with God another god; therefore, you twain, cast him into the terrible chastisement.’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:27: And his comrade shall say, ’Our Lord, I made him not insolent, but he was in far error.’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:28: He shall say, ’Dispute not before Me! For I sent you beforehand -- the threat.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:29: The Word is not changed with Me; I wrong not My servants.’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:30: Upon the day We shall say unto Gehenna, ’Art thou filled?’ And it shall say, ’Are there any more to come?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:31: And Paradise shall be brought forward to the godfearing, not afar:
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:32: ’This is that you were promised; it is for every mindful penitent.’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:33: Whosoever fears the All-merciful in the Unseen, and comes with a penitent heart:
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:34: ’Enter it in peace! This is the Day of Eternity.’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:35: Therein they shall have whatever they will; and with Us there is yet more.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:36: How many a generation We destroyed before them that was stronger in valour than they, then they searched about in the land; was there any asylum?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:37: Surely in that there is a reminder to him who has a heart, or will give ear with a present mind.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:38: We created the heavens and the earth, and what between them is, in six days, and no weariness touched Us.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:39: So be thou patient under what they say, and proclaim thy Lord’s praise before the rising of the sun, and before its setting,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:40: and proclaim thy Lord’s praise in the night, and at the ends of the prostrations.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:41: And listen thou for the day when the caller shall call from a near place.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:42: On the day they hear the Cry in truth, that is the day of coming forth.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:43: It is We who give life, and make to die, and to Us is the homecoming.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:44: Upon the day when the earth is split asunder from about them as they hasten forth; that is a mustering easy for Us.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 50:45: We know very well what they say; thou art not a tyrant over them. Therefore remind by the Koran him who fears My threat.

Muhammad Asad.verse 50:2: But nay – they deem it strange that a warner should have come unto them from their own midst; and so these deniers of the truth are saying, "A strange thing is this!
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:3: Why -[how could we be resurrected] after we have died and become mere dust? Such a return seems far-fetched indeed!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:4: Well do We know how the earth consumes their bodies, for with Us is a record unfailing.
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:5: Nay, but they [who refuse to believe in resurrection] have been wont to give the lie to this truth whenever it was proffered to them; and so they are in a state of confusion.
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:6: Do they not look at the sky above them – how We have built it and made it beautiful and free of all faults?
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:7: And the earth – We have spread it wide, and set upon it mountains firm, and caused it to bring forth plants of all beauteous kinds,
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:8: thus offering an insight and a reminder unto every human being who willingly turns unto God.
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:9: And We send down from the skies water rich in blessings, and cause thereby gardens to grow, and fields of grain,
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:10: and tall palm-trees with their thickly-clustered dates,
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:11: as sustenance apportioned to men; and by [all] this We bring dead land to life: [and] even so will be [man’s] coming-forth from death.
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:12: [Long] before those [who now deny resurrection] did Noah’s people give the lie to this truth, and [so did] the folk of Ar-Rass, and [the tribes of] Thamūd
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:13: and ’ād, and Pharaoh, and Lot’s brethren,
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:14: and the dwellers of the wooded dales [of Madyan], and the people of Tubba’: they all gave the lie to the apostles – and thereupon that whereof I had warned [them] came true.
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:15: Could We, then, be [thought of as being] worn out by the first creation? Nay – but some people are [still] lost in doubt about [the possibility of] a new creation!
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:16: NOW, VERILY, it is We who have created man, and We know what his innermost self whispers within him: for We are closer to him than his neck-vein.
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:17: [And so,] whenever the two demands [of his nature] come face to face, contending from the right and from the left,
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:18: not even a word can he utter but there is a watcher with him, ever-present.
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:19: And [then,] the twilight of death brings with it the [full] truth – that [very thing, O man,] from which thou wouldst always look away! –
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:20: and [in the end] the trumpet [of resurrection] will be blown: that will be the Day of a warning fulfilled.
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:21: And every human being will come forward with [his erstwhile] inner urges and [his] conscious mind,
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:22: [and will be told:] "Indeed, unmindful hast thou been of this [Day of Judgment]; but now We have lifted from thee thy veil, and sharp is thy sight today!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:23: And one part of him will say: "This it is that has been ever-present with me!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:24: [Whereupon God will command:] "Cast, cast into hell every [such] stubborn enemy of the truth,
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:25: [every] withholder of good [and] sinful aggressor [and] fomenter of distrust [between man and man – everyone]
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:26: who has set up another deity beside God: cast him, then, cast him into suffering severe!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:27: Man’s other self will say: "O our Sustainer! It was not I that led his conscious mind into evil – [nay,] but it had gone far astray [of its own accord]!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:28: [And] He will say: "Contend not before Me, [O you sinners,] for I gave you a forewarning [of this Day of Reckoning].
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:29: The judgment passed by Me shall not be altered; but never do I do the least wrong unto My creatures!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:30: On that Day We will ask hell, "Art thou filled?" – and it will answer, "[Nay,] is there yet more [for me]?"
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:31: And [on that Day] paradise will be brought within the sight of the God-conscious, and will no longer be far away; [and they will be told:]
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:32: "This is what you were promised – [promised] unto everyone who was wont to turn unto God and to keep Him always in mind
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:33: [everyone] who stood in awe of the Most Gracious although He is beyond the reach of human perception, and who has come [unto Him] with a heart full of contrition.
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:34: Enter this [paradise] in peace; this is the Day on which life abiding begins!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:35: In that [paradise] they shall have whatever they may desire – but there is yet more with Us.
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:36: AND HOW MANY a generation have We destroyed before those [who now deny the truth] – people of greater might than theirs – but [when Our chastisement befell them,] they became wanderers on the face of the earth, seeking no more than a place of refuge.
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:37: In this, behold, there is indeed a reminder for everyone whose heart is wide-awake – that is, [everyone who] lends ear with a conscious mind
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:38: and [who knows that] We have indeed created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them in six aeons, and [that] no weariness could ever touch Us.
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:39: HENCE, [O believer,] bear thou with patience whatever they may say, and extol thy Sustainer’s limitless glory and praise before the rising of the sun and before its setting;
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:40: and in the night, too, extol His glory, and at every prayer’s end.
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:41: And [always] listen for the day when He who issues the call [of death] shall call [thee] from close-by;
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:42: [and bethink thyself, too, of] the Day on which all [human beings] will in truth hear the final blast – that Day of [their] coming-forth [from death].
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:43: Verily, it is We who grant life and deal death; and with Us will be all journeys’ end
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:44: on the Day when the earth is riven asunder all around them as they hasten forth [towards God’s judgment]: that gathering will be easy for Us [to encompass].
Muhammad Asad.verse 50:45: Fully aware are We of what they [who deny resurrection] do say; and thou canst by no means force them [to believe in it]. Yet none the less, remind, through this Qur’ān, all such as may fear My warning.

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:1: Qāf . (I swear) by the glorious Qur’ān, (you are sent as a messenger.)
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:2: But they wonder that a warner has come to them from among themselves; so the disbelievers said, “This is something strange.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:3: Is it when we die and become dust (that we will be brought to life again?) That is a return, far (from understanding).”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:4: We know very well how much of them is diminished by the earth, and We have a Book that Preserves every thing.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:5: Rather, they rejected the truth when it came to them; so they are in a confused state.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:6: Did they not, then, look to the sky above them, how We have built it and beautified it, and it has no cracks?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:7: As for the earth, We have spread it out, and cast on it firm hills, and caused to grow therein every kind of delightful things,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:8: as a source of vision and as a lesson to every servant (of Allah) who turns (to Him for guidance).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:9: And We sent down blessed water from the sky, and caused to grow therewith gardens and grain of harvest,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:10: and towering date palms that have spadices, put one upon another,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:11: as a provision to the servants (of Allah). And We gave life with it to a dead land. Similar will be the exit (of the dead from their graves).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:12: It (resurrection) was rejected before them by the people of NūH, and the people of Rass and Thamūd,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:13: and ‘Ād, and Fir’aun (Pharaoh), and the brothers of LūT,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:14: and dwellers of Aaikah, and the people of Tubba’. Each one of them rejected the messengers; so My threat came true.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:15: Is it, then, that We were worn out by the first creation? No, but they are still in confusion about the new creation.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:16: Indeed We have created man, and We know whatever thoughts his inner self develops, and We are closer to him than (his) jugular vein,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:17: when the two receiving angels receive (every human act to record it), seated (one) on the right and (one) on the left.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:18: Not a single word is uttered by one but there is a watcher near him, ready (to record).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:19: The daze of death has (to) come with truth. That is what you tried to escape.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:20: And the Horn will be blown. That will be the day of (which) threat (was given).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:21: And everybody will come, along with one (angel) to drive (him to the field of reckoning) and one (angel) to testify (about his deeds).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:22: “You were heedless of this. Now We have removed your veil from you; so your sight today is sharp.”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:23: And his companion (i.e. the angel who recorded his deeds) will say, “This is what I have with me, ready (to be presented as his record of deeds).”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:24: (Then it will be said,) “Cast, (O two angels,) into Jahannam (Hell) every obstinate disbeliever
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:25: who used to prevent (others) from good (behavior), who transgressed all bounds, who cast doubts (in true faith),
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:26: who set up another god along with Allah. So cast him (O angels) in the painful punishment.”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:27: His (evil) companion (i.e. the Satan) will say, “O our Lord, I did not cause him to rebel, but he was himself (involved) in straying far from the track.”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:28: He (Allah) will say, “Do not quarrel before Me, while I had sent to you My threat well in advance.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:29: The Word is not changed with Me, and I Am not so unjust to My servants.”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:30: (Remind them of) the Day when We will say to Jahannam (Hell), “Are you filled up?” and it will say, “Are there some more?”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:31: And the Jannah (Paradise) will be brought close for the God-fearing, no longer distant.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:32: (And it will be said,) “This is what you were promised for everyone who was oft-returning to Allah, vigilant (against sins),
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:33: the one who feared the RaHmān (The All-Merciful Allah), without seeing Him, and came up with a heart oriented towards Him.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:34: Enter it in peace. That is the Day of Eternity.”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:35: They will have in it whatever they wish, and with Us there are things even more than that.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:36: And how many a generation We have destroyed before them who were stronger than these in their grip on power, and they searched out the cities. Was there any place (for them) to escape?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:37: Indeed, there is a lesson in all this for him who has a heart and gives ear (to the truth) attentively.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:38: We created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them in six days, and no weariness even touched Us.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:39: So, (O Prophet,) endure with patience what they say, and proclaim His purity, along with your Lord’s praise, before sunrise and before sunset.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:40: And in hours of night, proclaim His purity, and at the ends of prostration.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:41: And listen: The Day when the caller will call out from a near place,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:42: the Day they will hear the Cry in reality- that will be the Day of Resurrection.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:43: Surely We alone give life and bring death, and to Us is the final return
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:44: on the Day when the earth will burst apart exposing them, while they will be hurrying up (to come out). That is an assembly, so easy for Us (to muster).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 50:45: We know well what they say, and you are not (sent) as one who compels them. So exhort, through the Qur’ān, the one who fears My warning.

Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:2: Nay, but they consider it odd that there should have come to them a warner from among themselves. So the disbelievers say, ‘This is an odd thing!
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:3: What! When we are dead and have become dust? That is a far-fetched return!’
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:4: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a preserving Book.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:5: Nay, but they denied the truth, when it came to them and so they are [now] in a confounded situation.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:6: Have they not then looked at the heaven above them, how We have built it, and adorned it, and how there are no cracks in it?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:7: And the earth We have spread it out, and cast in it firm mountains, and caused every delightful kind to grow in it,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:8: as an insight and a reminder for every penitent servant.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:9: And We send down from the heaven blessed water with which We cause to grow gardens and the grain that is harvested,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:10: and the date-palms that stand tall with piled spathes,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:11: as provision for [Our] servants; and with it We revive a dead land. So shall be the rising.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:12: The people of Noah denied before them and [so did] the dwellers at al-Rass and Thamūd,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:13: and ‘ād, and Pharaoh, the brethren of Lot,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:14: and the dwellers in the wood, and the people of Tubba’. Each denied the messengers, and so My threat became due.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:15: Were We then wearied by the first creation? Nay, yet they are in doubt about a new creation.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:16: And verily We created man and We know what his soul whispers to him, and We are nearer to him than his jugular vein.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:17: When the two Receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:18: he does not utter a word but that there is beside him a watcher, [who is] ready.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:19: And the agony of death arrives with the truth. That is what you used to shun.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:20: And the Trumpet will be blown. That is the Day of the Promised Threat.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:21: And every soul will come, accompanied by a driver, and a witness:
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:22: ‘Verily, you were oblivious of this: So [now] We have removed from you your covering, and so your sight on this day is acute’.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:23: And his companion will say, ‘This is what I have ready with me [as testimony]’:
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:26: who has set up alongside God another god! Cast him then into the severe chastisement’.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:27: And his companion will say, ‘Our Lord! I did not make him a rebel, but he [himself] was in extreme error’.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:28: He will say, ‘Do not dispute in My presence, for I had already given you the threat.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:29: The word [that comes] from Me cannot be altered, and I am not unjust to servants’
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:30: on the day when We will say to Hell, ‘Are you [now] full?’ and it will say: ‘Are there any more?’
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:31: And Paradise will be brought near for the God-fearing, not far .
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:32: ‘This is what you were promised — [it is] for every penitent one, who is mindful,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:33: who fears the Compassionate One [while He is] in the Unseen, and comes with a penitent heart’.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:34: ‘Enter it in peace! That is the day of immortality’.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:35: Therein they will have whatever they wish; and with Us there is yet more.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:36: And how many a generation We destroyed before them, who were mightier than these in prowess, and [who] then searched throughout the land [wondering]: is there any escape?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:37: Assuredly there is in that a reminder for him who has a heart, or gives ear in [full] witness.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:38: And verily We created the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them, in six days, and no weariness touched Us.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:39: So endure [patiently] what they say, and glorify with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before the sunset;
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:40: and glorify Him at [some part of the] night and after prostrations.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:41: And listen on the day when the caller calls out from a place that is near.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:42: On the day when they hear the Call of truth; that is the day of coming forth.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:43: Indeed it is We Who give life and bring death, and to Us is the journey’s end.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:44: On the day when the earth is split asunder from them, [they will come] hastening forth. That is an easy gathering for Us.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 50:45: We know best what they say, and you are not [to be] a coercer of them. So admonish by the Qur’ān those who fear My threat.

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 50:1: Qaf. (Only Allah and the Messenger [blessings and peace be upon him] know the real meaning.) By the Glorious Qur’an,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 50:2: But they wondered that a Warner had come to them from amongst themselves. So the disbelievers say: ‘This is strange!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 50:3: Is it that when we are dead and have become dust (then we shall become alive again)? This return is far (from understanding and perception).’
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 50:4: Definitely, We know how much the earth (eats up and) consumes their (bodies), and We have a Book wherein everything is preserved.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 50:5: But (strange and far from understanding is this that) they denied the truth (i.e., the Messenger and the Qur’an) when it came to them. So they have themselves stepped into anxiety and confusion.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 50:6: Have they not looked at the sky above them how We made it and (how) We adorned it, and there is no crack in it?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 50:7: And (in the same way) We spread out the earth and We placed in it heavy mountains and produced in it every kind of beautiful plants.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 50:8: All that is (a source of) insight, direction and guidance for every servant who turns (to Allah in repentance).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 50:9: And We showered blessed water from the sky and then produced with it gardens and (also) the grain of harvests,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 50:10: And date-palms soaring high with layers of spathes.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 50:11: (This all is done as) sustenance for the servants, and We gave life with this (water) to the dead earth. In like manner is (your) coming forth from the graves.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 50:12: Before these (disbelievers of Mecca), the people of Nuh (Noah) and the people of the blind well (al-Rass in al-Yamama) and Thamud (the people of Salih, in the town of al-Hijr near Tabuk on the Medina-Syria road),
